item.title: How to get Trading view Alerts by sms for free
item.description:
Introduction

This will be the first post in our new blog! Today i am going to show how we can recieve alerts created on Trading view by sms directly on your mobile phone for free. At the time of this writing, trading view only sends email and email-to-sms alerts for â€¦
item.dc:creator: Franklin OKOLI
